sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>turtle</radical> radical and the <kanji>turtle</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Nice!
readingMnemonic: You know Dragon Ball Z, right? Imagine this <kanji>turtle</kanji> doing a <reading>Kame</reading>hameha (<ja>かめ</ja>). The turtle charges up his energy and releases a mighty Kamehameha blast. Shwooom!
readingInfo: See this turtle as he gathers energy, shaking the earth around him, gathering chi for his Kamehameha blast. He releases it in a mighty blast of energy. Kamehameha!!
